forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, then off and on rain showers for the afternoon. High 17C. E winds shifting to S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers this afternoon. High 63F. E winds shifting to S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early with some clearing overnight. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early with some clearing overnight. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. Thunder possible. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 54F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 17C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 63F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime after midnight. Low 49F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 46F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: More clouds than sun. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 56F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low near 45F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High around 55F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
